name: Lumo's Cat
description:
Take control of the bright and beautiful Star People to defend your cat against the hordes of noisy mice that are trying to wake your kitty from its sleep!

Move your Star People into defensive positions and use Healing Powers, Electroshock Attacks and Big Explosions to defeat the mousey-multitudes!

Only wits, tactics and a well timed BOOM can save the cat!

TACTICAL FUN! STRATEGIC DEPTH
Play for fun or take on the challenge - it’s up to you!

DRESS UP YOUR CAT
Dozens of accessories to make your cat look really, really stupid

THRILLING NEW SPECIAL EVENTS
- Get physical with MOUSE TAP!
- Get fearsome with the GIANT MOUSE!
- Get lucky with the CHAOS COLLIDER!

COMPETE WITH FRIENDS
Use Game Center to compare your Cat Blanket with friends!

RECORD AND SHARE VIDEOS OF YOUR GAME
Using iOS9 Replay Kit
